revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> '''NPCs''' (or '''non-player characters''') act as helpful guides to the player, giving them information about different features in the game or hinting to the locations and requirements of certain [[Obtainable Pokémon|Pokémon]].
==NPCs by region== <!--T:2-->
===[[Kanto]] NPCs=== <!--T:3-->
<!--T:4--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! NPC Name !! Location !! Function |- | [[File:Professor Oak.png|30px]]Professor Oak || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Pallet Town]] || Tells the player what is needed to progress to the next [[Regions|Region]]. |- | Mom || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Pallet Town]] || Tells the player about the NPCs. |- | [[File:Old Man.png|30px]]Old Man || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Viridian City]] || Teaches the player how to use the [[Pokéballs|Pokéball]] menu. |- | Battle Item Master || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Pewter City]] || Teaches the player about the use of [[Battle Items]]. |- | [[File:Scientist (female).png|30px]]Gem Scientist || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Pewter City]] || Tells the player about the [[Gems]] usage and how to get. |- | [[File:Burglar.png|30px]]Shady Salesman || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Route 3 Pokémon Center]] || Talks about the Shop Magikarp. |- | Berry Master || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Cerulean City]] || Gives the player hints about [[Berries|Berry]] farming. |- | [[File:Super Nerd.png|30px]]Super Nerd Jovan || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Cerulean City]] || Tells the player to download saves more frequently. |- | [[File:Gentleman (Gen 4).png|30px]]Fan Club Chairman || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Vermilion City]] || Informs the player about Typed [[Eggs]] |- | Shard Apprentice || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Vermilion City]] || Informs the player about [[Shards]] |- | [[File:Mr. Fuji.png|30px]]Mr. Fuji || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Lavender Town]] || Informs the player about increased rates of [[Shiny Chance|Shiny Pokémon]] |- | [[File:Channeler.png|30px]]Channeler Karina || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Lavender Town]] || Informs the player about [[Help:FAQ|FAQ]] Menu |- | [[File:Beauty (trainer).png|30px]]Big Spender || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Celadon City]] || Teaches the player about the [[Shops|Shop]] amount button. |- | Battle Item Master 2 || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Saffron City]] || Teaches the player about stacking [[Battle Items]]. |- | [[File:Pokémon Breeder (female).png|30px]]Breeder || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Saffron City]] || Teaches the player about breeding Pokémons. |- | [[File:Youngster.png|30px]]Youngster Wendy || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Fuchsia City]] || Informs the player about increased [[Roaming Pokémon]] rates. |- | [[File:Scientist (male).png|30px]]Researcher || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Cinnabar Island]] || Informs the player about the [[Roaming Pokémon|Roaming Nature]] of {{Pokemon|Mew}}. |- | [[File:Celio.png|30px]]Celio || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|One Island]] || Gives the player the quest to clear the Biker from Three Island. |- | [[File:Youngster.png|30px]]Youngster || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|One Island]] || Informs the player about {{Pokemon|Moltres}} and makes a joke about it. |- | [[File:Biker Goon.png|30px]]Biker || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Three Island]] || After beating the gang, despair of not beeing able to leave the island. |- | [[File:Bug Catcher.png|30px]]Bug Catcher John || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Six Island]] || Informs the player about the [[Roaming Pokémon|Roaming Nature]] of {{Pokemon|Pink Butterfree}} and {{Pokemon|Ash's Butterfree}} and Informs the player about increased [[Roaming Pokémon]] rates. |- | [[File:Ruin Maniac.png|30px]]Ruin Maniac || [[Altering Cave]] || Informs the player they have acess to the Pinkan Island. |- | rowspan=2|[[File:Professor Ivy.png|30px]]Professor Ivy || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Valencian Pokémon Center]] || Talks about the Valencian Pokémon forms found in that island. |- | [[Tanoby Ruins]] || Talks about the Unown Dungeon rotation in [[Tanoby Ruins]], [[Ruins of Alph]] and [[Solaceon Ruins]], talks about the [[Tanoby Ruins]] exlusive Unowns, being {{Pokemon|Unown (?)}} and {{Pokemon|Unown (!)}}. She mentions that she caught a {{Pokemon|Pinkan Dodrio}} which she is trading. |- | [[File:Officer Jenny.png|30px]]Officer Jenny || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Pinkan Pokémon Reserve]] || Informs the player that she is trading Pinkan Pokémon for [[File:Pinkan.png|30px]]Pinkan Berries. |- | [[File:.png|30px]] || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Client Island]] || . |- | [[File:.png|30px]] || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Client Island]] || . |}
===[[Johto]] NPCs=== <!--T:5-->
<!--T:6--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! NPC Name !! Location !! Function |- | [[File:Professor Elm.png|30px]]Professor Elm || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|New Bark Town]] || Tells the player what is needed to progress to the next [[Regions|region]]. |- | [[File:Technology Enthusiast.png|30px]]Technology Enthusiast || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|New Bark Town]] || Tells the player about [[Dungeons|Dungeon]] Chest mechanics |- | [[File:Mr. Pokémon.png|30px]]Mr. Pokémon || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Cherrygrove City]] || Teaches the player about the [[Pokemon Day Care|Hatchery]] Queue feature. |- | [[File:Earl Dervish.png|30px]]Earl Dervish || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Violet City]] || Teaches the player about [[Baby Pokémon]]. |- | [[File:.png|30px]]Wise Old Man || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Azalea Town]] || Tells the player about the [[Ilex Forest|location]] and [[Gyms#Johto_Indigo_Plateau|requirement]] needed to unlock Celebi. |- | [[File:.png|30px]]Hiker Daniel || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Azalea Town]] || Tells the player about the [[Union Cave|location]] and requirement needed for Lapras to appear. |- | [[File:.png|30px]]Bill || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Ecruteak City]] || Tells the player the requirements of Espeon and Umbreon. |- | [[File:.png|30px]]Pokéfan Derek || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Ecruteak City]] || Tells the player that they now have access to the three legendary Beasts. |- | [[File:.png|30px]]Kimono Girl || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Ecruteak City]] || Tells the player about the [[Tin Tower|location]] and [[Roaming_Pokémon|requirement]] needed to unlock Ho-Oh. |- | [[File:.png|30px]]Big Spender || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Goldenrod City]] || Teaches the player about the Shop amount button. |- | [[File:.png|30px]]SS Aqua Captain || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Olivine City]] || Tells the player about the [[Dock]]. |- | [[File:.png|30px]]Photography Aide || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Cianwood City]] || Tells the player about [[Berries#Wandering_Pokémon|Wandering Pokémon]]. |- | [[File:.png|30px]]Souvenir Shop Attendant || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Mahogany Town]] || Tells the player about [[Item Magnet]] effects. |- | [[File:.png|30px]]Pokéfan Trevor || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Blackthorn City]] || Informs the player about increased roamer rates. |}
===[[Hoenn]] NPCs=== <!--T:7-->
<!--T:8--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! NPC Name !! Location !! Function |- | [[File:.png|30px]]Professor Birch || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Littleroot Town]] || Tells the player what is needed to progress to the next [[Regions|region]]. |- | [[File:.png|30px]]Professor Birch's Aide || [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|Littleroot Town]] || Tells the player about updates to the Hatchery Queue. |- | [[File:.png|30px]]Tracking Scientist || [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|Oldale Town]] || Tells the player about the Roaming nature of Latios and Latias. |- | [[File:.png|30px]]Reporter Gabby || [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|Slateport City]] || Informs the player about increased roamer rates. |- | [[File:.png|30px]]Professor Cozmo || [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|Fallarbor Town]] || Informs the player about [[Battle Frontier|Deoxys]]. |- | [[File:.png|30px]]Weatherman || [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|Fortree City]] || Informs the player about the several forms of Castform. |- | [[File:.png|30px]]Pokemon Ranger Catherine || [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|Fortree City]] || Tells the player about the overuse of the [[Dowsing Machine]]. |- | [[File:.png|30px]]Astronomer || [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|Mossdeep City]] || Informs the player about the Roaming nature of Jirachi. |- | [[File:.png|30px]]Big Spender || [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|LilyCove City]] || Teaches the player about Shop amount button. |- | [[File:.png|30px]]Diver || [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|Pacifidlog Town]] || Teaches the player about Dungeon Loot rates increasing with clears |- | [[File:.png|30px]]Gym Leader Wallace || [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|Sootopolis City]] || Tells the player about the [[Cave of Origin|location]] and [[Gyms#Pokémon League Hoenn|requirement]] needed to unlock Groudon and Kyogre. |}
===[[Sinnoh]] NPCs=== <!--T:9-->
<!--T:10--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! NPC Name !! Location !! Function |- | [[File:.png|30px]]Contest Champion || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Twinleaf Town]] || Informs the player about the Roaming nature of Mesprit. |- | [[File:.png|30px]]Professor Rowan || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Sandgem Town]] || Tells the player what is needed to progress to the next [[Regions|region]]. |- | [[File:.png|30px]]Beachcomber || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Sandgem Town]] || Informs the player about the Roaming nature of Manaphy. |- | [[File:.png|30px]]Flower Girl || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Floaroma Town]] || Explains the [[Sinnoh#Location-dependent_Pokémon|conditions]] needed to evolve Eevee into Leafeon. |- | [[File:.png|30px]]Lass Caroline || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Eterna City]] || Informs the player about the [[Old Chateau|location]] and [[Dungeons#Sinnoh|requirement]] for Rotom and its forms. |- | [[File:.png|30px]]Construction Worker || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Oreburgh City]] || Explains the conditions needed to evolve Nosepass into Probopass. |- | [[File:.png|30px]]Contest Fan || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Hearthome City]] || Explains the conditions needed to evolve Magneton into Magnezone. |- | [[File:.png|30px]]Pal Park Warden || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Pal Park]] || Explains the [[Sinnoh#Weather-dependent_Pokémon|conditions]] needed to evolve Cherrim (overcast) into Cherrim (sunny). |- | [[File:.png|30px]]Riley || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Canalave City]] || Informs the player about the requirement to evolve Riolu. |- | [[File:.png|30px]]Young Boy || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Canalave City]] || Informs the player about the Roaming nature of Cresselia. |- | [[File:.png|30px]]Young Girl || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Snowpoint City]] || Explains the conditions needed to evolve Eevee into Glaceon. |- | [[File:.png|30px]]Ribboner Julia || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Sunyshore City]] || Explains the [[Sinnoh#Level-dependent_Pokémon|conditions]] needed to evolve Pilowswine into Mamoswine. |- | [[File:.png|30px]]Ace Trainer Quinn || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Fight Area]] || Informs the player about the requirement to unlock [[Distortion World]]. |- | [[File:.png|30px]]Hiker Kevin || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Survival Area]] || Informs the player about increased roamer rates. |}
===[[Unova]] NPCs=== <!--T:11-->
<!--T:12--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! NPC Name !! Location !! Function |- | [[File:.png|30px]]Musician || [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Castelia City]] || Informs the player about the roaming nature of {{Pokemon|Meloetta (Aria)}} |- | [[File:.png|30px]]Ruin Maniac || [[Relic Castle]] || Informs the player how to get {{Pokemon|Volcarona}} |- | [[File:.png|30px]]Excited Child || [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Humilau City]] || Informs the player about the roaming nature of {{Pokemon|Tornadus}} and {{Pokemon|Thundurus}}. |- | [[File:.png|30px]]Explorer || [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Nimbasa City]] || Informs the player about Mimics and the exclusive mimic in [[Relic Castle]] |- | [[File:.png|30px]]Fan Club Chairman || [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Icirrus City]] || Informs the player about how to obtain [[Black DNA]] and [[White DNA]] |- | [[File:.png|30px]]Professor Juniper|| [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Nuvema Town]] || Tells the player what is needed to progress to the next [[Regions|region]]. |- | [[File:.png|30px]]Professor Juniper's Aide || [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Nuvema Town]] || Informs the player about increased roamer rates. |- | [[File:.png|30px]]Colress || [[P2 Laboratory]] || Challenges the player to defeat him to unlock the Rare Pokémon in the lab. |}
===[[Kalos]] NPCs=== <!--T:13-->
<!--T:14--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! NPC Name !! Location !! Function |- | [[File:.png|30px]]Professor Sycamore || [[Towns & Cities#Kalos|Lumiose City]] || Tells the player what is needed to progress to the next [[Regions|region]]. |- | [[File:.png|30px]]Engineer || [[Towns & Cities#Kalos|Lumiose City]] || Informs the player about the [[Kalos Power Plant|location]] and [[Gyms#Pokémon League Kalos|requirement]] for Volcanion |- | [[File:.png|30px]]Birdwatcher || [[Towns & Cities#Kalos|Coumarine City]] || Informs the player about the roaming nature of the legendary birds. |- | [[File:.png|30px]]Furisode Girl Katherine || [[Towns & Cities#Kalos|Laverre City]] || Explains the [[Kalos#Weather-dependent_Pokémon|conditions]] needed to evolve Sliggoo into Goodra. |- | [[File:.png|30px]]Hex Maniac Melanie || [[Towns & Cities#Kalos|Anistar City]] || Informs the player about increased roamer rates. |- | [[File:.png|30px]]Confused Hiker || [[Towns & Cities#Kalos|Kiloude City]] || Informs the player about the roaming nature of Hoopa. |- |}
===[[Alola]] NPCs=== <!--T:15-->
<!--T:16--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! NPC Name !! Location !! Function |- | [[File:Scratch Cat Girl.png|30px]]Scratch Cat Girl || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Iki Town Outskirts]] || Informs the player about the {{Pokemon|Lycanroc (Dusk)}} Requirement |- | [[File:Professor Kukui.png|30px]]Professor Kukui || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Professor Kukui's Lab]] || Informs the player about the missing Pokémon |- | [[File:Teacher.png|30px]]Teacher Emily || [[Trainers' School]] || Explains how dungeon floors work |- | [[File:Hala.png|30px]]Kahuna Hala || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Iki Town]] || Explains The Trials And Grand Trials |- | [[File:Looker.png|30px]]Looker || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Roadside Motel]] || Talks about Ultra Beasts and explain how to catch them |- | [[File:Owner.png|30px]]Café Owner || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Heahea City]] || Informs the player about The Trials of Akala island and The Kahuna. |- | [[File:Actor.png|30px]]Actor Meredith || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Paniola Town]] || Informs the player about Oricorio and the berry colors that attracted it in the farm. |- | [[File:Preschooler (female).png|30px]]Spectator || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Royal Avenue]] || Informs the player about the {{Pokemon|Alolan Raichu}} and {{Pokemon|Alolan Exeggutor}} Evolution Requirements. |- | [[File:Olivia.png|30px]]Kahuna Olivia || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Konikoni City]] || Informs the player about The Alola Pokémon League |- | [[File:Aether Branch Chief Wicke.png|30px]]Aether Branch Chief Wicke || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Aether Paradise]] || Informs the player the Boosted Roamer Rate Route |- | [[File:Nanu.png|30px]]Kahuna Nanu || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Malie City]] || Informs the player of The Requirements To Fight him |- | [[File:Worker.png|30px]]Worker Ovid || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Tapu Village]] || Informs the player about how to evolve {{Pokemon|Crabrawler}} into {{Pokemon|Crabominable}} |- | [[File:Team Plasma (colress).png|30px]] Colress || [[Mount Lanakila]] || Talks about the Light [[Evolution Items]] drop from {{Pokemon|Solgaleo}}, {{Pokemon|Lunala}} and {{Pokemon|Necrozma}}. |- | [[File:Mina.png|30px]]Captain Mina || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Seafolk Village]] || Informs the player of the Requirements of [[Mina's Houseboat]] Dungeon and where the next Kahuna is |- |} </translate>
